18423.「あっ。<pc>じゃん。\n よく来たわね。:
Ah. It's <pc>. Nice of you to show
up.

18424.「ハッパなら お使いに行ってるわよ。: If it's Happa, he's out running errands.

18425.「あの子 いろいろ がんばってるわ。\n もう 大樹に戻れないことを わかってる:
She's doing her best in many ways. She knows
she can't go back to the big tree, and she's
trying to face her fate head on.

18426.「これからは エルフとして\n 生きていかなくちゃならないってね。: From now on, I have to live as an Elf.

18427.「今時 あんな素直な子 めずらしいわ。\n 育ってきた環境も 特殊だし\n いろ:
It's rare to find such an honest girl
nowadays. She's had a very unique upbringing,
and she's an interesting girl in so many ways.

18432.「さてと あたし 用があるから\n ちょっとだけ 留守にするわね。:
Well, I'm going away for a little while
because I have something to do.

18434.「あの博士さん 毎日 がんばってるの。\n ま…魔瘴の研究で 大変なの。\n だ:
That doctor is working hard every day.
Researching demon miasma is hard work. That's
why, I...

18435.「お…おいしいもの 作って\n 博士さんに 食べてもらいたい……。:
I want to make something delicious for you to
eat.

18436.「ボク 料理の本を読んだの。\n すごいスタミナ料理を 作りたいけど\n 材料を:
I read a cooking book. I want to make an
amazing stamina dish, but it's hard to gather
the ingredients...

18437.「ここから北 カミハルムイ領北の西の\n カムイラの穴にある カミトナキノコが\:
North of here, west of Kamiharmui Area North,
in Kamuira Hole, I need some Kamitna
Mushrooms, but I don't have anyone to ask...

18438.「ボクと 一緒に 洞くつに行って\n カミトナキノコを と…採らない？\n お…:
Would you like to go to the cave with me and
pick some mitonite mushrooms? Please.

18439.「や…やった！ ありがと！\n ボク とっても うれしい！: Ya... we did it! Thank you! I'm so happy!

18440.「えへへ。博士さんの よろこぶ顔\n はやく 見たいな～。: Hehehe. I can't wait to see your pleased face.

18442.「や…やった！ ありがと！\n でも ほかの人たちの頼まれごとで\n なんだか:
Ya... we did it! Thanks! But he seems to be
full of other people's requests...

18443.「ボク ここで待ってる。\n 用事が終わったら また来てね。:
I'll wait for you here. Come again when you're
done with your business.

18444.「そ…そうだよね。ごめんなさい。\n 変なこと 頼んだりして……。:
So...yes, you're right. I'm sorry. I didn't
mean to ask you to do anything weird.

18445.「でも ほかに話せる人がいないし\n ど…どうすればいいんだろ。:
But there is no one else I can talk to,
so...what should I do?

18447.「ボクね あの博士さんにね\n おいしいものを 作ってあげたいの。\n でも 材:
I want to make something delicious for that
doctor. But it's hard to gather the
ingredients...

18448.「ここから北 カミハルムイ領北の西の\n カムイラの穴にある カミトナキノコが\:
North of here, west of Kamiharmui Area North,
in Kamuira Hole, I need some Kamitna
Mushrooms, but I don't have anyone to ask...

18449.「ボクと 一緒に 洞くつに行って\n カミトナキノコを と…採らない？\n お…:
Would you like to go to the cave with me and
pick some mitonite mushrooms? Please.

18450.「ここから北 カミハルムイ領北の西の\n カムイラの穴にある\n カミトナキノコ:
I want the Kamitna mushrooms in Kamuira Hole,
west of Kamiharmui Area North North of here.

18451.「ボク あの博士さんに\n おいしいもの 作ってあげたい……。\n ボク 後から:
I want to make something delicious for that
doctor... I'll follow you.

18452.「あのね。お城の厨房を借りて\n カミトナキノコで スタミナ料理を作ったの。\n:
You know what? I rented the castle kitchen and
made a stamina dish with Kamitona mushrooms. I
put it on the doctor's desk.

18453.「えへへ。さっき 帰ってきたから\n 今頃 食べてるはずだよ。\n 博士さん よ:
Hehehe. I just came back a little while ago,
so they should have eaten it by now. I hope
he'll be pleased with it.

18454.「イタタ……。いやあ まいった。\n 厨房にあった キノコ料理をつまみ食いしたけ:
Ouch... Oh, no, I'm so sick of it. I snacked
on some mushrooms from the kitchen, but they
tasted terrible, and I even scared myself.

18455.「おいおい それ もしかして\n リン様が作った 危ない料理じゃないか？\n オ:
Hey, hey, hey. Isn't that possibly a dangerous
dish made by Master Lynn? I ate it once before
and got in trouble.

18456.「やれやれ もう たくさんだ……。\n 戦いの前じゃなくて よかったよ。:
Oh dear, I've had enough of this... thank
goodness it wasn't before the battle.

18461.「博士さん ぜんぶ食べたの……？: Did you eat all of them...?

18462.「うん。食べたわよ。\n なかなか いい味だったわ。: Yeah. I ate it. It tasted pretty good.

18464.「うん？ なんともないわよ？\n てか もっと食べたいんだけど\n これさ おか:
Yeah? - Yeah. I'm fine. I mean, I'd like some
more, but don't you have any more of this?

18465.「えへへ。今 ないんだ。\n また 作ってきてもいい？:
Heh heh. I don't have any right now. Can I go
make some more?

18468.「……この料理さ カミトナキノコでしょ？\n これ カムイラの穴でしか採れないし:
...this dish. Kamitna mushrooms, right? They
only come from the Kamuira Hole, and that's
where I went. Did you find anything unusual?

18469.「ふんふん……。なるほどね。\n ちっ。イムイ地下空洞だけじゃなく\n 今度は:
Hmmm... I see. Damn. Not only did it occur in
the Imui Underground Cave, but now it's in
Kamuira Hole...

18470.「王都付近の大地が 暗黒大樹活性化の\n 影響を 受け始めている……。\n じわ:
The land near Royal City is beginning to be
affected by the activation of the Dark Tree...
and it's slowly getting closer.

18471.「このままじゃ 王都に\n 魔瘴が発生するのも 時間の問題か……。:
At this rate, it's only a matter of time
before demon miasma appears in Royal City...

18472.「あたし 王さまの所に行ってくるね。: I'm going to visit the king.

18475.「な…なんでもない。\n 博士さん いってらっしゃい。: It's nothing. Have a nice trip, Doctor.

18476.「うん。すぐ 戻ってくるからね。: I'll be right back. I'll be right back.

18478.「カムイラの穴に 魔瘴が発生したこと\n あなたのクチから 証言してほしいから\:
I want your mouth to testify that demon miasma
has occurred in Kamuira Hole, so please come
to the King's Chamber later.

18479.「……ボク さっき 博士さんのこと\n 名前で呼ぼうとしたけど できなかったの。:
I tried to call you by your name earlier, but
I couldn't do it. I was kind of embarrassed...

18480.「ご…ごめんね 変なこと言って。\n 博士さん 王の間に来てって 言ってたよね？:
I'm... sorry, that was a weird thing to say.
You said to come to the King's Chamber, right?
You'd better get going.

18481.「えへへ。あの博士さんなら\n 王さまに 会いにいったよ。: Heh heh. That doctor went to see the king.

18482.「……ボク さっき 博士さんのこと\n 名前で呼ぼうとしたけど できなかったの。:
I tried to call you by your name earlier, but
I couldn't do it. I was kind of embarrassed...

18483.「ご…ごめんね 変なこと言って。\n 博士さん 王の間に来てって 言ってたよね？:
I'm... sorry, that was a weird thing to say.
You said to come to the King's Chamber, right?
You'd better get going.

18484.「<pc>。待ってたわ。\n カムイラの穴で あなたが見たことを\n 王さまに:
<pc>. I've been waiting for you.
Report to the King what you saw in Kamuira
Hole.

18485.「……うむ。なるほどな。\n カムイラの穴にも 魔瘴が発生したか。:
...Mm-hmm. I see. Demon miasma has occurred in
Kamuira Hole, too.

18486.「<pc>が言うなら まちがいあるまい。\n 徐々に 王都に近づいてきているな。:
If <pc> says so, he must be right.
We're getting closer and closer to Royal City.

18487.「はい。このまま放置しては 王都に\n 魔瘴が発生するのも 時間の問題でしょう。:
Yes, I think so. If left unchecked, it's only
a matter of time before demon miasma appears
in Royal City.

18488.「……よし 今すぐ 準備を始めよう。\n 戦力を集めねば この難局は切り抜けられ:
...All right, let's start preparing now. We
must gather our forces, or we will not make it
through this difficult time.

18489.「では あの作戦で行くと……。\n 本当に よろしいのですね？:
So, if we go with that plan... are you sure
you are okay with that?

18490.「残念だが 致し方あるまい……。\n 我々の目的は あくまでも\n 王都カミハル:
Unfortunately, it cannot be helped but our
purpose is to protect the Royal City
Kamiharmui.

18491.「その目的を 果たすためなら\n わしは 手段を選ばぬ。:
I will do whatever it takes to achieve that
goal.

18495.「緊急命令を 発動する！\n 各地にいる兵士たちを\n 王都カミハルムイに 召集:
Emergency order! Call all the soldiers in the
provinces to the Royal City Kamiharmui!

18497.「ご苦労だったな。\n <pc> ハネツキ博士。\n もう 下がってよいぞ。:
Thanks for your efforts. <pc> Dr.
Hanetsuki. You may step back now.

18498.「はい。では 失礼します。: Yes, I am. Now, if you'll excuse me.

18499.「そうだ <pc>。\n ちょっと 話が あるから\n 後で あたしの部屋に来て:
Yes, <pc>. I need to talk to you
about something, so come to my room later.

18500.「ねぇねぇ 博士さん。\n 今度は どんな料理がいい？:
Hey, hey, doctor. What kind of food do you
want this time?

18501.「自然破壊は 好きじゃないけど\n これも 王都カミハルムイの平和のため……。\:
I don't like the destruction of nature, but
for the sake of peace in Royal City
Kamiharmui... it can't be helped...

18503.「あっ。ごめんね。\n えーと なんの話だっけ？: Ah. Sorry. What was I talking about?

18504.「ボクね また料理を作るの。\n どんな料理が 食べたい？:
I'm cooking again. What kind of food do you
want to eat?

18505.「あーっと 料理ね。\n うん。なんでもいいわよ。\n あたし 好き嫌いないから:
Ah, cooking. Yeah. Anything is fine. I don't
have any preferences.

18507.「えへへ！ カミトナキノコ！\n お手伝いしてくれて ありがとね！\n これ！:
Ehehe! Kamitna mushrooms! Thanks for helping
me out! Here! It's my way of saying thank you!

18508.「ボク 博士さんから\n いろいろ 買い物を頼まれてるんだ。\n えへへ。行って:
I've been asked to do a lot of shopping by Dr.
Koh. Heh heh. I'm off.

18509.「<pc>。さっきは\n 王さまに証言してくれて ありがとね。:
<pc>. Thanks for testifying against
the king earlier.

18510.「……もうすぐ 大規模な作戦が始まるわ。\n だから その時は……:
...a major operation will be starting soon. So
when that happens...

18511.「ハッパのこと 見ててほしいの。\n ごめん お願いね。:
I want you to keep an eye on Happa. I'm sorry,
please.

29460.「あ…あった！ あれだよ！: Ah... there it is! There it is!

29461.「うわ！ ま…魔瘴！？\n こんな所にまで……？: Whoa! Demon miasma! It's even here...?

29462.「どうしよう……。\n やっぱり あきらめるしか……:
I don't know what to do... I'll just have to
give up...

29463.「で…でも あのキノコがないと\n 博士さんに 料理が作れない！:
But... but I can't cook for you without those
mushrooms!

29465.「えへへ。ボクなら 心配ないよ。\n 魔瘴に触れても 平気だからね。:
Heh heh. Don't worry about me. I'm fine with
demon miasma.

29466.「カミトナキノコ……。\n 採れて よかった……。: Kamitona mushrooms... I'm glad we got them...

29467.「でも 博士さんには ないしょにしてね。\n 魔瘴に触れちゃダメって 言われてる:
But please don't tell the doctor. He told me
not to touch the demon miasma...

29468.「ボク はやく 料理を作ってあげたいから\n 王都に 戻ってるね。:
I want to cook for you soon, so I'll be back
in Royal City.

29584.魔瘴が 辺りに立ち込めている。\nこれ以上 先に進むのは危険なようだ。:
Demon miasma is in the air. It seems dangerous
to proceed any further.
